know_passage: Dairy-based products should also concern us. Milk consumption significantly contributes to environmental degradation. A kilo of cheese (about 2.2 pounds) has approximately the same carbon footprint as driving 34 miles. Despite the nutritional value of milk, consuming just 30 grams of cheese three to five times a week for a year results in a carbon footprint equivalent to driving 514 miles or heating a home for 31 days.
